Genesee Home is located in Genesee Valley in the northern Sierra Nevada of California. The valley is seven miles long and one mile wide at an elevation of 3,800 feet and surrounded by 8,000 foot mountains. Genesee Home is located in the old town of Genesee, which now consists of a Country Store, Genesee Home and two other residences.

The home sits in the center of a 1,600 acre ranch which is surrounded by national forests. The property is an incredible piece of God's creation and has many grazing meadows, four creeks/streams, and six small fishing lakes.

Genesee Home is committed to building up church ministry by enriching the lives of Pastors and their spouses. Genesee Home is a safe haven where Pastors can reflect upon their calling and rekindle relationships with both God and their spouses.

Genesee Home is truly a slice of heaven.
 
  • Are you a member of an Evangelical Church and interested in supporting your Pastor?
  • Would you like to give a gift of appreciation to an Inner City Pastor?
  • Would you like to give a gift of appreciation to a church planting pastor?
  • Would you like to give a gift of appreciation to a Missionary?
  • Are you a Mission's Pastor or Chairperson of a Mission's Committee of your local church and looking for your way to bless your Missionary couples?

If you can answer YES to any of these, then visit our "Gift of a Visit" section to learn more about this part of Genesee Home's ministry.
